name: Halloween Pro
description:
You shouldn't wait for the October 31st to come to celebrate the Halloween and enjoy the costume parties, trick-or-treating adventures and playing the Halloween related games. Halloween Pro is a free endless runner game and you need to run as far as you can, dodge the zombies, duck the signs, jump over the obstacles, and collect as many candies as possible on your way to unlock new characters.

So, if you like the Halloween theme and like playing such jump and dash games, then Halloween Pro can be easily named as your best companion. You just need to download the game for free on your iPhone or iPad device and enjoy your adventures journey.

High-Quality Halloween Theme with Realistic Sound Effects

How many Halloween symbols can you think of? The Halloween design, brings all the Halloween symbols you can imagine to the gameplay; from black cats, bats and spiders, to ghosts, witches, skeletons and even zombies. And don’t forget about the candies, pumpkins, haunted houses and the graveyards. Green, Orange, Grey and Black have been mostly used in the designs and the high quality 3D graphics along with the realistic sound effects, make you feel being trapped in a street on the Halloween night and you would do anything it takes to escape from such scary environments.

Easy To Learn, Yet Addictive Gameplay

Well, like any other jump and dash games, the gameplay is as simple as swiping left or right to dodge the character and change the line. Halloween Pro comes with a clean and neat design and the gameplay is so easy to learn that you’ll get used to it after jumping and running for a few times. The gameplay is endless but you have to start over as soon as you hit an obstacle. Other than trying to avoid hitting the obstacles, you also need to collect as many candies as possible to be able to unlock new characters and come back from dead if needed.

Speaking of different characters, they have been carefully designed to make sure their outfits are suitable for a Halloween party and everyone can easily find what goes with their moods the most.

So, you just have one life (which can be increased by spending candies when being hit) and you need to dodge, dash, and move through the obstacles and challenges. There are also some power-ups, like Magnet or Slowing Down, which boost your performance and let you collect more candies and run further distances.

What Makes This Endless Runner Game Stand Out from the Crowd?

While there are so many other runner games, why should I install this specific game and play it? Well, here are some reasons:
One. it comes with a Halloween theme, and all the details and materials have been designed with high quality.
Two. The characters are just fun and cool, and you just want to play as many times as it takes to unlock the entire collection
Three. The gameplay is addictive and you just want to play the game over and over to improve your high score and collect more coins.
Four. It’s a perfect choice for kids and they get to spend hours of fun with family and friends.
And of course there are more reasons to explore.

Halloween Pro: Jump & Dash Main Features at a Glance:

• Clean and neat design with fresh interface
• Easy to learn, yet addictive gameplay
• Wonderful graphics with realistic sound effects
• Halloween-based theme
• Different characters to choose
• Collect power-ups to boost your performance
• Collect candies to get extra life and unlock new characters
• Fun for all ages
• Free

So, if you are into such endless runner games and looking for Halloween-based designs, then download Halloween Pro for free and enjoy jumping and dashing through different obstacles and challenges. Make sure to collect power-ups to boost your performance and collect candies to be able to unlock new characters.

Stay tuned and let us know about any bugs, questions, feature requests or any other suggestions.

Run as far as you can and enjoy your adventures journey.
